item.title: How Do Computers Work?
item.description:

It follows instructions very, very fast â€” using electricity and tiny switches.

1) Computers speak ONE simple language: 1s and 0s

Inside a computer, everything becomes:

  • 1 = ON
  • 0 = OFF

Thatâ€™s it.

Games, YouTube, homework, Roblox, Minecraft â€” it all becomes huge patterns of 1s and 0s.

item.title: What Is Calculus? (Explained Like Youâ€™re 5)
item.description:
If you hear the word calculus, it probably sounds big. Complicated. Slightly terrifying.

Relax.

At its heart, calculus is just the math of change.

And if youâ€™re five years old, you already understand change better than you think.

The World Is Always Changing

Think about your day:

  • A balloon gets bigger when you blow into it ğŸˆ
  • You ride your bike faster and faster ğŸš²
  • Rain fills up a bucket drop by drop ğŸŒ§ï¸
  • You grow taller every year

Nothing stays still.
